participant_1.background:
I loved to play make believe in the woods behind my house.
My parents are supportive of my career as a translator.
I'm from the Midwest, where we drive big trucks and have big hands.
I had to give up my two dogs when I moved, but I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in.
I like to make my own Christmas cards.

participant_2.background:
My father is a wildlife veterinarian and my mother is an animal rights activist.
My first guitar was my favorite thing I ever bought.
I want to make my family proud.
I'm thinking about getting a new crib for my baby.
I can work all day as long as I have my coffee.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to today?
Not much, just trying to figure out the best way to get a new crib for my baby.
Oh, that's exciting! How far along are you?
I'm about 5 months now, so it's not too early to start thinking about it.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great mom. My parents are really supportive of my career as a translator, so that's nice.
Thanks! My parents are both really involved in animal rights activism, so I want to make them proud.
That's great! My parents are really supportive of my career as a translator, so that's nice.
Oh, that's interesting. What's your favorite part about being a translator?
I love getting to learn about different cultures and languages. It's really rewarding to be able to help people communicate with each other.
That's really cool! I love learning new things too. I'm thinking about getting a guitar soon. My dad is a wildlife veterinarian and he always wanted me to play one.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be great at it. I used to play the piano when I was younger, but I never had the time to keep it up.
Thanks! I'm excited to learn how to play. I think it would be really fun to be able to play songs for my baby.
That would be so cute! I'm sure your baby will love it.
Thanks! I'm sure they will too.
